trans-unit.source: Sets the mouse cursor icon for a particular control.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the mouse cursor icon for a particular control.

target.mrk: Sets the mouse cursor icon for a particular control.

trans-unit.source: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

seg-source.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

target.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

trans-unit.source: cursor ID as used by Windows SetCursor API (use -1 for the default mouse cursor for the control)

seg-source.mrk: cursor ID as used by Windows SetCursor API (use -1 for the default mouse cursor for the control)

target.mrk: cursor ID as used by Windows SetCursor API (use -1 for the default mouse cursor for the control)

trans-unit.source: Unlike GUISetCursor() which changes the mouse cursor for an entire window, this function sets the mouse cursor that is used when the mouse is hovering over the specified control.

seg-source.mrk: Unlike GUISetCursor() which changes the mouse cursor for an entire window, this function sets the mouse cursor that is used when the mouse is hovering over the specified control.

target.mrk: Unlike GUISetCursor() which changes the mouse cursor for an entire window, this function sets the mouse cursor that is used when the mouse is hovering over the specified control.

trans-unit.source: If the cursorID is invalid the standard arrow will be displayed.

seg-source.mrk: If the cursorID is invalid the standard arrow will be displayed.

target.mrk: If the cursorID is invalid the standard arrow will be displayed.

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid cursor IDs see MouseGetCursor().

seg-source.mrk: For a list of valid cursor IDs see MouseGetCursor().

target.mrk: For a list of valid cursor IDs see MouseGetCursor().

trans-unit.source: CursorId = 16 will hide the mouse cursor.

seg-source.mrk: CursorId = 16 will hide the mouse cursor.

target.mrk: CursorId = 16 will hide the mouse cursor.
